title: Speech skills: using your voice effectively
brief_description: In a television setting, pictures projected onto a screen change to live-action examples of situations where the effective use of your voice is important. Problems that are the result of the speaker’s volume, pitch, voice quality and articulation are examined, with suggestions for overcoming them.
